description: With an aim to create a versatile slide sandal that glides over the sea and the street, we bring you the Nalu Slide. Offering all-day comfort, breathability, and full adjustability to accommodate a range of foot widths, the water-resistant Nalu Slide is the perfect sandal when you need to transition from a surf session to pau hana.
name: Olukai Nalu Slide - Mens

specs.value: Water-resistant, adjustable synthetic straps with ultra-soft, quick-drying jersey knit lining and micro hook-and-loop closure
Compression molded, EVA midsole with smooth drop-in ICEVA footbed provides anatomical fit for sustained comfort
Non-marking rubber outsole featuring a sea urchin lug design and razor siping for added traction
